Articles.Content:
Couldn't find this beauty anywhere using the search function so I decided to share it.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wgdbZhnFD5g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Enjoy!
This is why I use HDEV as a screensaver at night. So relaxing watching the Earth go by, even if most of the time its just he Pacific ocean that you can see.

> 
> Couldn't find this beauty anywhere using the search function so I decided to share it.

That one's going to get some plays on the home entertainment system via Chromecast , first chance I get. Thanks for sharing the link!
Amazing, so happy you shared this.
